statements: DELETE FROM ProteomicsData WHERE sample_id = 100 AND protein_name = 'Protein A';
DELETE FROM ProteomicsData WHERE peptide_sequence LIKE '%ABC%' AND spectra_intensity > 50;
DELETE FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM Gene WHERE chromosome_id = 5 AND end_position > 1000;
